dataset.name: ds1
dataset.sql: select vv.id,vv.name,vv.service_type,vv.cover,nvl(vv.watch_count,0) as watch_count,nvl(vv.collect_count,0) as collect_count, vw.last_watch_time,nvl(vc.serial_number,10000000)as serial_number,vc.if_shelves from (select user_id,video_id,max(create_time) as last_watch_time from vms_watched where video_type = 2 and user_id = '$user.id$' group by user_id,video_id) vw,V_VMS_VIDEO_COUNTPROP vv,vms_cast_info vc where vw.video_id = vv.id and vv.id=vc.id and vc.if_shelves='1' order by vw.last_watch_time desc,watch_count desc,collect_count desc

transcode.transcode: select service_type_name from vms_dic_service_type where service_type_code= '$SERVICE_TYPE$'
